    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Informacijske storitve (storitve interneta)</string>
            <string language="en">Information services (Internet services)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informationsdienste (Internet-Dienstleistungen)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Services d'information (services d'Internet)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Serviços de informação (serviços do Internet)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Servizi d'informazione (servizi del Internet)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υπηρεσίες πληροφοριών (υπηρεσίες Διαδικτύου)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Servicios informativos (servicios del Internet)</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Poglavje o informacijskih storitvav v sklopu e-gradiva za računalništvo in informatiko. Vsebina poglavja: oddaljeni dostop, prenos datotek, elektronska pošta,...</string>
            <string language="en">Chapter about information services, part of e-materials for computer science and informatics. Chapter contents: remote access, file sharing, e-mail, ...</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">internet</string>
            <string language="en">internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">storitev</string>
            <string language="en">service</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">informacijski sistem</string>
            <string language="en">information system</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kapitel über Informationsdienste, Teil 
Ematerialien für Informatik und Informatik. Kapitelinhalt: 
Fernzugriff, teilende Datei, E-mail...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chapitre au sujet des services d'information, 
partie d'e-matériels pour l'informatique et informatique. 
Contenu de chapitre : accès à distance, fichier 
partageant, E-mail...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Capítulo sobre serviços de informação, parte 
dos e-materiais para a informática de e informatics. Índices 
do capítulo: acesso remoto, lima que compartilha, E-mail...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Capitolo circa i servizi d'informazione facente 
parte i e-materiali per informatica ed informatica. Soddisfare 
di capitolo: accesso a distanza, archivio che si ripartisce, 
E-mail...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κεφάλαιο για τις υπηρεσίες πληροφοριών, μέρος των 
ε-υλικών για την πληροφορική και την πληροφορική. 
Περιεχόμενο κεφαλαίου: εξ' αποστάσεως πρόσβαση, 
αρχείο που μοιράζεται, ηλεκτρονικό ταχυδρομείο...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Capítulo sobre servicios informativos, parte de 
los e-materiales para la informática e informática. Contenido 
del capítulo: acceso alejado, fichero que comparte, E-mail...</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Service</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informationssystem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">service</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
